head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths PILCHER, WILLIAM F.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths PILCHER, WILLIAM F.

block.p: PILCHER-William F., 89, of Southbury, CT, on April 29, 2000. Husband of Elizabeth Killiam Pilcher. Memorial service Wednesday, May 24, at 11 AM, at Madison Avenue Presbyterian Church at 73rd St. Contributions may be made to the Society of Colonial Wars in the State of New York, 122 E. 58 St., New York, NY 10021, or the Visiting Nurse Association, 27 Princeton Road, Suite 101, Watertown, CT 06795.
